short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block unwanted content from LinkedIn feed based on keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean up your professional feed by filtering out unwanted content based on keywords you choose. This lightweight extension helps you customize your networking experience by blocking posts containing specific terms, letting you focus on the content that matters to you. Perfect for maintaining a distraction-free professional feed and improving your browsing productivity.
